basic_information.scholarship_name: Finney Scholars Scholarship for History & Geography

description: This scholarship honors Dr. Frank Finney, Jr. In 1971, he became the first dean of the newly-formed College of Liberal Arts. Dr. Finney was passionate about developing the creative potential of students and giving them a sound background in their academic disciplines. "The Finney" recognizes Liberal Arts students who are identified as having a proven record of high academic achievement in their major. Eligibility Requirements Declared History/Geography major Minimum 3.5 GPA in major 3.5 GPA overall Full-time undergraduate or graduate student in good standing with the University Must show practical evidence of excellence in the discipline as determined by the department Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
